text: I can remember very clearly the first
time I encountered a startup I had never
been an uh an investor I'd never been an
attorney working with startups and and
came to Silicon Valley during the late
90s in this incredible time and I spent
three hours working with this amazing
entrepreneur to talk about his business
and by the time I was finished with that
conversation I realized that that
startups were the most addictive thing
I'd ever encountered and and from that
time forward I've been just uh
completely transfixed with the startup
Universe I think the point of these eirs
the point of having people like myself
available and floating around is that
over the last 15 years of being a
venture capitalist I've seen 15,000
business plans I've met with 1,500
companies some of which have done
incredibly well some of which have
crashed crashed and burned in profound
ways and the opportunity to say hey let
me tell you what I'm thinking about let
me ask you questions about how I'm
building my business and and let you
draw upon this universe of experience
and share it that that's a um that's an
opportunity that everybody should take
advantage of not because I'm going to
give you the wisdom not because I'm
going to give you answers but because
you're going to leave that conversation
with a lot more questions and you're
going to understand that every decision
you make is in the context of everything
that's come before it entrepreneurship
and Venture Capital are two sides of the
exact same coin right my job is not to
be a good Financial engineer my job is
to find amazing entrepreneurs who are
doing transformative things and then
help them be more successful and while
uh Venture capitalists aren't the people
doing the work what we do as Venture
investors and what entrepreneurs do uh
is really in the exact same universe
it's all about making good choices it's
about understanding options it's about
understanding uh the powers that be that
are coming that are pushing you forward
or pushing you back and uh and trying to
to overcome those things and build
something new and
amazing
